明星；流行明星；流行歌星

bilingual.target: 汤姆斯乐队演奏流行音乐。
蓝色多瑙河是流行音乐。

bilingual.source: Rap is very important in pop music.
bilingual.target: 说唱在流行音乐中非常重要。

bilingual.source: Do you like American pop or rock?
bilingual.target: 你喜欢美国流行音乐或摇滚吗？

bilingual.source: Do you like pop or traditional music?
bilingual.target: 你喜欢流行音乐还是传统音乐？

bilingual.source: You listen to pop music, Lingling, don't you?
bilingual.target: 玲玲，你听流行音乐，对吧？

bilingual.source: Which does Lingling like, traditional music or pop music?
bilingual.target: 玲玲喜欢传统音乐还是流行音乐？

bilingual.source: Do you like traditional Western music or pop music, Betty?
bilingual.target: 贝蒂，你喜欢传统的西方音乐还是流行音乐？

bilingual.source: I went to a pop concert and a basketball game last week.
bilingual.target: 我上周去看了流行音乐会和篮球比赛。

list.abstract: POP 英 [pɒp] 美 [pɑ:p] vi. （意外地、突然地）出现; 突然出现; 发出爆裂声; （突然地）行动 vt. （突然地）伸出; （突然地）提出问题; （把准备好的东西）突然拿出来; 敲击 n. 流行音乐; 汽水; （尤用作称呼）爸; （迅速打上的）记号 adj. 流行音乐的; 通俗风格的; 通俗的; 现代的 adv. 爆炸；砰地 abbr. 邮局协议(post office protocol)
POP是英文Point of Purchase的缩写，译为＂购买点的广告＂，也称为终点广告。因为POP广告是消费者购买商品前所接受的最后一次广告。 其表现形式夸张幽默，色彩强烈，常见的形式有海报、展示架、大招牌、实物模型、旗帜等，主要商业用途是刺激引导消费和活跃卖场气氛。

yingyinNormal.en: But there is the internet and YouTube has proven to be a driving force for world pop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有互联网，油管，已经证明是世界流行音乐的驱动力。

yingyinNormal.en: Look at Korean pop, look at K-pop for example. Korea is an export-based economy and they are outward looking and they must be outward looking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看韩语流行音乐的例子，韩国是一个基于出口的经济，他们向外看，而且他们必须向外看。

yingyinNormal.en: And where can we go to listen to world pop? I don't think there's a world pop station or magazine, unfortunately there are none, there should be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以去哪里听世界流行音乐呢？我认为没有一个世界音乐站，或者杂志，很遗憾没有，我觉得应该要有。

yingyinNormal.en: So world pop also suggests a worldwide pop culture and something that can be shared by all of us and gives us a lot of common ground.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，要有世界流行音乐，就要有一个世界范围的流行文化，是一种可以被所有人共享的东西，给我们一个共同的领地。

yingyinNormal.en: But then one day, I went to my first Chinese pop concert and it was Harlem Yu performing in the Taipei Music Centre.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是有一天，我第一次去了华语流行音乐会，是庾澄庆在台北社交馆。

yingyinNormal.en: But world pop is more about breaking and tearing down age-old stereotypes, the artificial confines that have kept us apart for way too long.
yingyinNormal.zh: 世界流行音乐更加地打破老旧的刻板印象，打破那种将我们隔开太久的人工界线。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to frankly, openly and honestly talk about how we've done a good job, or how we've done a bad job of bringing Chinese pop to the west.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要开诚布公地谈谈在将华语流行音乐带到西方这件事上，我们什么做好了，什么没做好。

yingyinNormal.en: Pop-Tarts and Yoo-hoo. Breakfast of champions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 果馅饼和饼干。冠军专用早餐。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't you pop it, Polly. George loves his balloon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要把它戳破了，波利。乔治喜欢他的气球。

yingyinNormal.en: There, that's a C-pop mixtape that you can check out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们可以看到，这是一盘华流录音带。

yingyinNormal.en: Pop my tarts pop my tarts Pop-Tarts, Pop-Tarts, Pop-Tarts A boppa-boppa boppa-tarts-
yingyinNormal.zh: 夹心饼干，我的夹心小饼干  夹心饼干，夹心饼干，夹心小饼干  夹夹夹心小饼干干干

yingyinNormal.en: There's J-pop, there's K-pop, there's C-pop, and there's like this W-pop, that's kind of starting to emerge. It's world pop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有日流，有韩流，就有华流，还有一个世界流，它们开始融合。

yingyinNormal.en: She looks so small. I know. At least she's with Pop-Pop and Aunt Phylis now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她看起来好小。我知道至少她现在有外公和菲力斯婶婶陪伴。

yingyinNormal.en: And I don't know, finish selling this, nice dad and his son a... What was it? A Jumbo-Pop. Please. A Jumbo-Pop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且，还得给这位爸爸和他儿子卖一根什么？大冰棒，拜托了。大冰棒。

yingyinNormal.en: I've got wine at my place and some bubble wrap we could pop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我家有酒，我们还可以摁泡泡塑料包装。

yingyinNormal.en: No! 'Sup, Riles? Pop's lesson hitting a little close to home?
yingyinNormal.zh: 别说了。咋了，莱丽？你老爸的课和现实联系得有点紧密哈。

yingyinNormal.en: You ate my PPTs? Personal Pop-Tarts. You gave them a cute name?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你吃了我的PPT吗？个人夹心饼干。你还给它们取昵称啦？

yingyinNormal.en: George has got Polly's birdseed. George. That is too much birdseed. Polly will grow very big and burst like a balloon. Pop. Burst like a balloon. Pop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治给波莉倒了鸟食。乔治！你倒得太多的鸟食啦。波莉吃了会长很大，然后像气球一样爆炸！像气球一样爆炸。

yingyinNormal.en: The last of the mozzarella on top, like so, pop that back onto the top.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最后放在顶上的水牛芝士，要这样，再盖上盖子。

yingyinNormal.en: Jeff? Pop! I'm okay. I was on the other wing. They brought us to Jersey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰夫？老爸，我没事，我在另一边的机翼上，救援人员接我到了新泽西。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 受欢迎，讨人喜欢的状态；普及，流行
adj. 不得人心的；不流行的
adj. 受…欢迎的；令人喜爱的；令人赞赏的；令人欣赏的；大众化的；通俗的；民众的；群众性的；普遍的；多数人的

word_family.mean: n. 流行音乐；砰的响声；甜味汽水；鲜艳的一小块；小腾空球；父亲；神父；早期基督教神学家

examination_example.sentence: They both just <highlight>pop</highlight> into my mind in the same way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们只是以同样的方式跃入我的脑海中。

sense_info_list.en: cause something to burst, making a pop

exam_freq_info.chinese: 流行音乐; 流行事物

examination_example.sentence: In addition, <highlight>pop</highlight> stars or influential people have a duty to act as positive role models.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，流行明星或有影响力的人有义务充当积极的榜样。

examination_example.sentence: They take <highlight>pop</highlight> stars as their idols.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把流行歌星当作偶像。

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays, most people like to listen to <highlight>pop</highlight> and rock music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，大多数人喜欢听流行音乐和摇滚乐。

examination_example.sentence: My bed simply <highlight>pops</highlight> out of the wall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的床突然从墙上弹了出来。

examination_example.sentence: Problems of different kinds kept <highlight>popping</highlight> up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 各种各样的问题不断出现。

examination_example.sentence: As noted above, indifferent relationships may not always be the most helpful approach in resolving some of the issues that <highlight>pop</highlight> up at work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如上所述，在解决工作中出现的一些问题时，冷漠的关系可能并不总是最有帮助的方法。

examination_example.sentence: Indifferent relationships may not always be the most helpful approach in resolving some of the issues that <highlight>pop</highlight> up at work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要想解决工作中突然出现的一些问题，这种“冷漠关系”也许并不总是最有效的解决方法。

examination_example.sentence: It started as a mama-and-<highlight>pop</highlight> operation and the childless Wallaces always considered employees to be part of their family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它最初是一家夫妻店，没有孩子的华莱士夫妇一直认为员工是他们家庭的一部分。

sense_info_list.en: cause something to burst, making a pop

word_usage.usage:
pop表“流行音乐(的)”，既有名词词性，也有形容词词性。作名词时，pop为不可数名词。
示例：She is a pop star.
她是一个流行音乐歌星。

examination_example.sentence: It is an IT transformation project gone wrong, where swollen expectations have been <highlight>popped</highlight> and a list of promised efficiencies have been reversed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个出错的信息技术转型项目，膨胀的期望破灭了，承诺的效率清单被逆转了。

examination_example.sentence: Given this environment, consumers should be skeptical and ignore the latest study that <highlight>pops</highlight> up on your news feed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这样的环境下，消费者应该持怀疑态度，并忽略在你的新闻动态中弹出的最新研究。

examination_example.sentence: I enjoyed studying different kinds of cars and planes, playing <highlight>pop</highlight> music, and collecting the latest music albums.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我喜欢研究各种各样的汽车和飞机、播放流行音乐以及收集最新的音乐专辑。

examination_example.sentence: I enjoyed studying different kinds of cars and planes, playing <highlight>pop</highlight> music, and collecting the latest music albums.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我喜欢研究各种各样的汽车和飞机、播放流行音乐以及收集最新的音乐专辑。

examination_example.sentence: We're bringing you an evening of live rock and <highlight>pop</highlight> music from the best local bands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将为您带来现场摇滚和流行音乐之夜，这些音乐人都来自当地最好的乐队。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, we had a <highlight>pop-up</highlight> camper with comfortable beds and an air conditioner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，我们有一个具有舒适的床和空调的弹出式露营车。

明星；流行明星；流行歌星

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Pop</highlight> music can make people feel happy and comfortable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 流行音乐能让人感到快乐和舒适。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Pop</highlight> music has been popular since the 1950s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 流行音乐从20世纪50年代开始流行。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Pop</highlight> music is another kind of musical style.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 流行音乐是另一种音乐风格。

sense_info_list.en: cause something to burst, making a pop

examination_example.sentence: The danger of <highlight>popping</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 爆胎的危险。

examination_example.sentence: I felt the avalanche slow down and I just <highlight>popped</highlight> right out of the snow at the bottom of the valley.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我感觉到雪崩的速度减慢了，我从谷底的雪中跳了出来。

word_usage.usage:
pop表“流行音乐(的)”，既有名词词性，也有形容词词性。作名词时，pop为不可数名词。
示例：She is a pop star.
她是一个流行音乐歌星。
